meanings: Verb be out of breath, pant

vlive.korean: 안 느껴지시나요? 저만 느끼는 건가요? You can't see it? Is it just me? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 다시 🐢
vlive.english: You can't see it? Is it just me?

vlive.korean: [헷갈린다규] 고양이가 못 느끼는 거예요? 호박이만 못 느끼는 거예요? [Confused GYU] Are you talking about all cats or just Hobak? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.6
vlive.english: [Confused GYU] Are you talking about all cats or just Hobak?

vlive.korean: [고양이들은 단맛을 느끼는 미뢰가] - 정답은 O - 오케이! [Cats don't have sugar detectors on their] - The answer is O. - Okay! 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.6
vlive.english: [Cats don't have sugar detectors on their] - The answer is O. - Okay!

vlive.korean: [과열 양상의 이유] - 기운만 느끼는 거잖아요 - 잡았잖아! [This was why there was too much heat] - I was feeling it. - You grabbed it! 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [GOING SEVENTEEN 2020] EP.2 2020 : MYSTERY MYSTERY #2
vlive.english: [This was why there was too much heat] - I was feeling it. - You grabbed it!

vlive.korean: 도대체 뭘 느끼는 거예요? 그럴 때마다? What on earth do you sense from me? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : 정겸이의 모닝식사🍽
vlive.english: What on earth do you sense from me?

examples.korean: Handmade goods appeal to those who are tired of cookie-cutter products. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 수제품은 비슷비슷한 상품들에 싫증을 느끼는 사람들에게 매력적으로 다가간다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Handmade goods appeal to those who are tired of cookie-cutter products. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He sounded genuinely interested. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 정말 흥미를 느끼는 것 같았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He sounded genuinely interested. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I hated myself for feeling jealous. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 질투심을 느끼는 내 자신이 미웠다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I hated myself for feeling jealous. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She doesn’t seem to feel the cold. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 추위를 안 타는[못 느끼는] 것 같다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She doesn’t seem to feel the cold. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I have a high pain threshold. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 고통을 느끼는 한계점이 높다[고통을 잘 참는다]. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I have a high pain threshold. Add to Wordbook
